availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Claiborne County, Tennessee, and Clay County, Kentucky, resident. Tennessee native. Married to Hugh Mize. Mother of Daniel L. Mize, Rachael Mize, Eli Mize, Melvina Mize, and Nervester Mize. Resident of Claiborne County, Tennessee, in 1860. Resident of Clay County, Kentucky, in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Claiborne County, Subdivision 6, p. 294.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Precinct 1, p. 155A.
